application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Application to approve details of conditions 9 (Parking), 12 (Parking Allocations) and 14 (Parking Facilities) pursuant to application 23/00906/FUL for application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) for alterations to the fenestration and the construction of balconies of planning permission Ref: 22/01329/FUL for the Proposal under section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 regarding the upwards extension of 2 storeys to provide 15 residential flats (C3) above the existing building and will be increasing by 6.5m in height above the highest part of the roof of the existing building approved on 21/03836/PRIORC to allow alterations to the materiality and fenestration along with a lift to the rear of the approved development.
